text: Hi all, I ma trying to turn a CPU run into a GPU run so I can do some high resolution tests and maybe, down the line, play with the Stokes drift fields. What version of CUDA is required?

elements.text: Hi all, I ma trying to turn a CPU run into a GPU run so I can do some high resolution tests and maybe, down the line, play with the Stokes drift fields. What version of CUDA is required?

text: CUDA.jl will download any necessary CUDA drivers so you generally don't have to worry about the CUDA library version

elements.text: CUDA.jl will download any necessary CUDA drivers so you generally don't have to worry about the CUDA library version

text: If you have an old GPU it might be too old to support everything in CUDA.jl but a warning will be printed in this case

elements.text: If you have an old GPU it might be too old to support everything in CUDA.jl but a warning will be printed in this case
